name: MECCHA ZOMBIES
description: Refreshingly knock out massive impending zombies, in this new top-down shooter! Clean up zombies and earn GOLD to boost up your skill and ability, and aim for 100% area capture!
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 10 (64bit) Processor: IntelR Core i3 - 4170 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT730 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectXR Compatible Sound Card
